Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that President Trump has not announced a vaccine to cure the coronavirus.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that a scientist has "finally found a vaccine to cure the coronavirus" when no such announcement has been made.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence provided to substantiate the claim that a vaccine has been found.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that President Trump will make an announcement about a vaccine, even though there is no evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that clinical trials for potential vaccines are still ongoing and it will take time before a vaccine is available.
